item.title: Azure Tables Lifecycle Manager
item.description: A library designed to automate the lifecycle management of Azure Tables by handling retention, expiration, and deletion of data based on configurable policies.

item.title: FIFA Stat Extractor
item.description: Scrapes match statistics from EA Sports FC screenshots, converting them into JSON and CSV formats for analysis

item.title: Paving
item.description: A platform offering tools that enhance fitness tracking, including features like personalized Strava heatmaps, performance reports, route photo finders, and activity renaming, helping athletes better visualize and optimize their fitness journeys.
